text:
int main ( ) { int c = 0 , n , r , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; printf ( "
" ) ; int a [ r ] [ r ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } printf ( "
" ) ; } c = a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] [ i ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ) c = c + a [ i + 1 ] [ i ] ; else c = c + a [ i + 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ; } printf ( "
%d" , c ) ; } return 0 ; }
